ch0170_00_arty/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
You and your Pokémon look like two peas in a
pod today, don’t you!
ch0170_00_arty/0101_0701_02_10:
Your friendship is a work of art, you know that?
You two are like my muses, always inspiring me
to create!
ch0170_00_arty/0601_0701_01_10:
A wise man once said that in order to appreciate
a Bug Pokémon, you first have to look at its
body...how it’s structured.
ch0170_00_arty/0601_0701_02_10:
An even wiser man said that you have to touch
it with a gentle hand to truly understand
its beauty...
ch0170_00_arty/0601_0701_03_10:
*sigh*
It’s impossible to describe to you how beautiful
Bug Pokémon are. Words don’t do them justice.
ch0170_00_arty/0601_0702_01_10:
By the way, I should tell you that the wise men
I mentioned are actually me.
ch0170_00_arty/0601_0702_02_10:
Not that I wanted to hide it or anything... I just
want you to know how amazing Bug Pokémon
are, no matter how you look at them.
ch0170_00_arty/0601_0702_03_10:
If you ever partner up with one, I’m sure you’ll
understand what I’m talking about.
ch0170_00_arty/0602_0701_01_10:
How many discoveries have you made since you
started your adventure?
ch0170_00_arty/0602_0701_02_10:
When I was a kid, my innocent heart was
captured by the beauty of Bug Pokémon.
ch0170_00_arty/0602_0701_03_10:
I drew with them and battled with them, and after
all this time, I continue to discover new things.
ch0170_00_arty/0602_0701_04_10:
A world shared with Pokémon is a world
swarming with mysteries.
ch0170_00_arty/0602_0702_01_10:
As long as there are mysteries to be discovered,
I’ll continue making my art.
ch0170_00_arty/0602_0702_02_10:
I’m always on the lookout for new and interesting
things. That’s why I can always find inspiration!
ch0170_00_arty/0603_0701_01_10:
Bug Pokémon are just the greatest. I could talk
about them all day if given the chance!
ch0170_00_arty/0603_0701_02_10:
I mean, look at Caterpie. Their skin is so soft and
squishy... Did you know they give the best hugs?
ch0170_00_arty/0603_0701_03_10:
Whenever I see a Trainer with a Caterpie, I can’t
help but run up to them and ask if I can give it
a hug!
ch0170_00_arty/0603_0702_01_10:
I love all Bug Pokémon, but at the end of the day,
it’s my partner that I love the most.
ch0170_00_arty/0603_0702_02_10: My ace, Leavanny, is just the best!
ch0170_00_arty/0603_0702_03_10:
I think it’s so sweet how Leavanny makes clothes 
for other Pokémon out of leaves.
ch0170_00_arty/0604_0701_01_10: This world is full of all different kinds of people.
ch0170_00_arty/0604_0701_02_10:
Everyone’s ways of thinking and lifestyles are
very different.
ch0170_00_arty/0604_0701_03_10:
Sometimes, I’m not even sure if I understand what
people are saying, to be honest.
ch0170_00_arty/0604_0701_04_10:
But one thing we all have in common is that we
all care a lot about Pokémon.
ch0170_00_arty/0604_0702_01_10:
Even when meeting for the first time, people can
talk about Pokémon. It’s common ground.
ch0170_00_arty/0604_0702_02_10:
On Pasio, you can form teams with Trainers you
just met and battle together, right then and there!
ch0170_00_arty/0605_0701_01_10:
I need to discover new things that inspire me or
else I get really horrible artist’s block.
ch0170_00_arty/0605_0701_02_10:
It can be the smallest, most trivial detail—
anything at all! That feeling of discovery feels
like a spark igniting within me.
ch0170_00_arty/0605_0701_03_10: With happiness comes inspiration, I guess!
ch0170_00_arty/0605_0702_01_10:
The sync pairs I’ve encountered here on Pasio
have been an endless source of discovery and
inspiration for me.
ch0170_00_arty/0605_0702_02_10:
In fact, the piece I’m working on now was
actually inspired by you and your partner!
ch0170_00_arty/0605_0702_03_10:
Once it’s finished, I want you two to be the first to
see it! I’m just buzzing to show it to you!
ch0170_00_arty/1701_0701_01_10: Ooh! I’m glad I ran into you!
ch0170_00_arty/1701_0701_02_10: I have a present for you! I think you’ll like this.
ch0170_00_arty/1701_0702_01_10:
How you decide to use it is up to you.
I hope it comes in handy!
ch0170_00_arty/2501_0701_01_10:
Somebody once told me that Pokémon are different
from humans—that they are living beings that
contain unknown potential.
ch0170_00_arty/2501_0701_02_10:
We have no way of knowing what they think
about us.
ch0170_00_arty/2501_0701_03_10:
But not knowing that is what pushes me to try
my hardest! So that I can see eye to eye with
my Pokémon!
ch0170_00_arty/2501_0702_01_10:
People and Pokémon should help one another!
If we can do that, the world will be a much more
peaceful place.
ch0170_00_arty/2501_0702_02_10:
I think it’s amazing that people and Pokémon are
so different.
ch0170_00_arty/2501_0702_03_10:
Our individuality is what makes us so insectible—
I mean incredible! And it makes our art that much
more diverse.
ch0170_00_arty/2511_0701_01_10:
Once, my artist’s block was so bad that I went to
look at bones with Lenora, hoping they’d give me
some inspiration.
ch0170_00_arty/2511_0701_02_10:
While I was there, I realized that even though we
were looking at the same bones, we had totally
different perspectives.
ch0170_00_arty/2511_0701_03_10:
The bones helped me realize that I can continue
being creative and making art in my own way.
ch0170_00_arty/2511_0701_04_10:
I’m sure you have your own unique perspective
as well. Do what makes you happiest, and follow
your heart!
ch0170_00_arty/2511_0702_01_10:
Do you have a place or a possession that helps
get you back on track when you’re feeling stuck,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0170_00_arty/2511_0702_02_10: If you do, you should treasure it.
ch0170_00_arty/2511_0702_03_10:
One day, maybe it’ll inspire you to achieve your
dreams. That’s what art really is in the end,
isn’t it?
ch0170_00_arty/3001_0701_01_10:
*yawn*
I’m so sleepy today... I must have been drawing
late into the night again. Whoops!
ch0170_00_arty/3002_0701_01_10:
You know, for all the warmth and light the sun
provides us, we sure tend to take it for granted.
ch0170_00_arty/3003_0701_01_10:
Anything that brings out the beauty in Bug-type
Pokémon makes my heart flutter. It’s the little
things that count!
ch0170_00_arty/3004_0701_01_10:
Ahh, Bug Pokémon... Their majestic beauty never
fails to fascinate me!
ch0170_00_arty/3005_0701_01_10:
Hmm... The starry sky tonight would make a
beautiful backdrop for a drawing of my Pokémon.
ch0170_00_arty/3006_0701_01_10:
Inspiration tends to strike me juuust before I fall
asleep at night. Trouble is, I feel like I have to
draw right then and there or I’ll lose it!
